headline: PGIM Fixed Income Hires Oliver Nisenson as Head of Asset-Based Finance
summary: NEWARK, N.J., April 01, 2025--PGIM Fixed Income has hired Oliver Nisenson as head of asset-based finance (ABF), effective May 15, 2025. In this newly created role, he will lead the continued growth of the firm’s global private ABF platform within its $131 billion securitized products business.1 Nisenson will report to Gabriel Rivera and Edwin Wilches, co-heads of securitized products. With $837 billion in assets under management, PGIM Fixed Income is one of the largest fixed income managers glob
